Job ID.description: unique identifier for each job ad

Search Keyword.description: search term used for data collection

Gender.description: gender categorization of job based on Standard Industrial Classifications (SBI2008; 2018)

Age.description: age categorization of job based on Standard Industrial Classifications (SBI2008; 2018)

Platform.description: name of job search online platforms from which data was collected

Company Name.description: name of company that posted job ad

Rating.description: ONLY AVAILABLE FOR GLASSDOOR PLATFORM JOB ADS - rating of company out of 5 stars

Type of ownership.description: IN DUTCH - ONLY AVAILABLE FOR GLASSDOOR PLATFORM JOB ADS - type of company ownership

Employment Type.description: IN DUTCH - ONLY AVAILABLE FOR GLASSDOOR PLATFORM JOB ADS - type of employment for advertised job position

Seniority Level.description: IN DUTCH - ONLY AVAILABLE FOR GLASSDOOR PLATFORM JOB ADS - level of seniority for advertised job position

Company URL.description: URL of company advertising job position

Job Age.description: IN DUTCH - time passed between job ad being posted and job ad being collected

Job Age Number.description: IN DUTCH - time passed between job ad being posted and job ad being collected

Job Date.description: date on which job ad was posted

Collection Date.description: date on which job ad was collected
